title: How Many Calories Are in a Big Mac Meal?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in big mac meal, including full nutrition breakdown for the burger, fries, and drink, plus tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Big Mac Meal?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Big Mac meal: Big Mac burger, medium fries, medium Coca-Cola (no ice); values based on US menu.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion sizes, and brands. Check McDonald's app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Big Mac meal totals about 1020 kcal, with high carbs from fries and bun.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Remove the bun from Big Mac

faqs.q: How many calories are in big mac meal without drink?
faqs.a: About 880 kcal for Big Mac and medium fries only.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Big Mac meal?
faqs.a: Approximately 134 g total carbs, mostly from fries and soda.

faqs.q: Is a Big Mac meal high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1940 mg, mainly from the burger and fries.

faqs.q: How does a Big Mac meal compare to a Quarter Pounder meal?
faqs.a: Similar calories (around 1000-1100 kcal), but varies by sides.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Big Mac meal?
faqs.a: Opt for apple slices instead of fries and water or diet drink to cut ~400 kcal.
